Step-by-Step Solution

Clue 15: The Blend smoker is next to the person drinking Water. Since Milk (Position 3) and Coffee (Position 4) are taken, Water must be in Position 5. This means Blend is in Position 4 or Position 5.

Clue 11: The owner of the Horse is next to the Dunhill smoker. Since Dunhill must be in Position 2 (Clue 7), Horse is in Position 1 or 3. Position 1 (Norwegian) → Horse.
Clue 10: The Blend smoker is next to the owner of the Cat. Position 4 (Blend) → Cat in Position 3 or 5. Since Bird is in Position 3, Cat → Position 5.
Step 5: Assign nationalities and remaining details.
